the one ingredient most associated with
french food is garlic
and it's no surprise almost every one of
my french recipes

is a member of the allium or onion

and strengths
pink garlic from lotrek in south west
france is considered the finest with a
strong sweet taste

arminiak from gascony in the south west

for the creme caramel melt plain caster
sugar until it turns dark golden
pour into ramekins sprinkle with
lavender flowers
and cool now to make a simple custard
gently heat whole milk in a pan until
steaming

seeds and lavender sugar

pour the hot milk

the custard is smooth

oven for around 30 minutes
until set cool in the fridge then when
